title: Trump says Europe 'weak' and 'faithful servant' Winkleman
description: The US president has attacked Europe, with his comments splashed across a number of Wednesday's front pages.
content: US President Donald Trump has declared European leaders "weak", with his comments splashed on a number of Wednesday's front pages. According to the Metro, the president "lambasted 'decaying' European nations" for their failure to take action to end t... [2900 chars]

title: Biggest reforms to policing since the 1960s ‘being threatened by lack of money’
description: Home secretary’s plans for a radical reshaping of policing in England and Wales could be delayed due to lack of funds
content:
The home secretary’s ambitions for the biggest reforms to policing since the 1960s are being threatened by a lack of money, with plans being considered for the creation of Britain’s FBI and slashing the number of forces.
Shabana Mahmood believes a ra... [4319 chars]

title: Champions League: Big night for Arne Slot and Liverpool with no Mohamed Salah
description: Liverpool win away in the Champions League without Mohamed Salah for the first time since 2009, in a big night for boss Arne Slot.
content:
Who knows what the narrative would have been had Dominik Szoboszlai not converted from the penalty spot?
The noise surrounding Mohamed Salah would only have gotten louder. More dropped points for Liverpool without their star man.
Yet it was Liverpool... [3884 chars]

title: UK asylum system hit by inefficiencies and wasted funds, watchdog finds
description: In a new analysis, the National Audit Office finds “reactive” government policies moved problems elsewhere.
content:
6 hours ago
Daniel SandfordUK correspondent
The UK's asylum system is affected by inefficiencies, "wasted public funds" and a succession of "short-term, reactive" government policies that have moved problems elsewhere, the National Audit Office (NAO)... [4080 chars]

title: How long Britain could really fight for if war broke out tomorrow
description: In the event of a war, one expert suggests the British Army could be incapable of fighting effectively on land within weeks, once committed - though 'much depends on the form of the conflict'.
content: Russia's full-scale war on Ukraine will soon enter its fifth year. Mysterious incidents of so-called "hybrid warfare" are mounting in Europe, increasing tensions. And in the UK, military chiefs have warned we must prepare for war if we want to avoid ... [11262 chars]
